attributes.additional_details: dance flava is a more than a dance studio it's a center for 0-16 years it runs youth clubs to keep are teens off the streets baby clubs,holiday clubs, its a well loved dance studio there to help create self essteam through dance etc. recently our local councils received a complaint from a neighbour and this resulted in the start of the closure which has left the children heartbroken with no activities to do in this small town we would like the government to keep this building free from closure
